TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Mongolia, title = Mongolia, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mongolia} }

S.FORM: Mongolia hya' ga cyux maki' tay 46 00 N, 105 00 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 1,564,116 sq km (maki' tay 19ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 1,553,556 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 10,560 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 3,031,330. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 73% , lhlahuy hya' ga 7%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 20%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Ulaanbaatar. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 11 na tay mpitu' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj, aring ryax 18 squ byacing tay 6 sa kawas 2009 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Mongolia hya' ga cyox maki' tay 46 00 N, 105 00 E na Aziya' syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 1,564,116 sq km (maki' tay 19ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 1,553,556 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 10,560 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 3,031,330. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 73% , lhlahoy hya' ga 7%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 20%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Ulaanbaatar. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 11 na tay mpito' byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj, aring ryax 18 sqo byacing tay 6 sa kawas 2009 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
